Kural_Info.Tamil_Text: குடியென்னும் குன்றா விளக்கம் மடியென்னும் மாசூர மாய்ந்து கெடும்.
Kural_Info.English_Meaning: The indestructible lamp of family (rank) will be extinguished by the darkness of idleness.

Layered_Composition.Foreground: A magnificent, ever-burning, ornate lamp, symbolizing the undiminishing luster of a noble family ('குன்றா விளக்கம்').
Layered_Composition.Midground: A monstrous, dark, shadowy entity, representing Idleness ('மடி என்னும் மாசூர'), is shown creeping towards the lamp. It is a being made of thick, black, sooty smoke.
Layered_Composition.Background: The monster of Idleness reaches the lamp and its darkness completely engulfs and snuffs out the eternal flame, leaving only a wisp of smoke and utter darkness ('மாய்ந்து கெடும்').

Art_Direction.Subject_and_Action: The great light of a family's honor and dignity will be extinguished by the great darkness of laziness.
Art_Direction.Symbolic_Motifs: The undiminishing lamp is the family's honor. The monster of darkness is Idleness. The act of the monster extinguishing the flame is the central, tragic event.
Art_Direction.Lighting_and_Color: The scene transitions from the bright, warm, golden light of the lamp to complete, oppressive darkness. The monster is a light-absorbing black.

Technical_Cues.Camera: A static shot that focuses on the lamp, allowing the viewer to witness the tragedy as the monster of idleness approaches and destroys the light.
Technical_Cues.Resolution: 8K, cinematic, with high-quality smoke and fire effects.
Technical_Cues.Lighting: Dynamic lighting that is extinguished during the scene.
